title: Simmons Peak (Tuolumne Meadows)
text:
Simmons Peak is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a>, in the <a href="Tuolumne%20Meadows">Tuolumne Meadows</a> region of <a href="Yosemite%20National%20Park">Yosemite National Park</a>. In difficulty, its routes range from <a href="Rock%20scrambling">scrambling</a> to . It is a few miles north of <a href="Mount%20Lyell%20%28California%29">Mount Lyell</a>.
Simmons Peak is the 12th-highest mountain in Yosemite, if not often climbed, partially due to its not being on the <a href="Sierra%20Club%27s">Sierra Club's</a> "<a href="Sierra%20Peaks%20Section%20SPS%20List">Sierra Peaks Section SPS List</a>".
Near to Simmons Peak.
